# sss-example

## npm package
shamir's secret sharing: [secrets.js-grempe](https://www.npmjs.com/package/secrets.js-grempe)
encrypt/decrypt: crypto

## PreInstall
- typescript
- ts-node

## Install
```
yarn install
```

## Exec
```
ts-node src/index.ts
```

## Exec output
